00026 // lbann_model .hpp .cpp - Abstract class for neural network training models
00028 
00029 #ifndef LBANN_MODEL_HPP
00030 #define LBANN_MODEL_HPP
00031 
00032 #include "lbann/lbann_base.hpp"
00033 #include "lbann/lbann_comm.hpp"
00034 #include "lbann/layers/lbann_layer.hpp"
00035 #include "lbann/utils/lbann_summary.hpp"
00036 #include "lbann/io/lbann_file_io.hpp"
00037 #include <vector>
00038 #include <string>
00039 
00040 namespace lbann {
00041 
00042 // Forward-declare this.
00043 class lbann_callback;
00044 
00048 class model {
00049 public:
00050   model(lbann_comm* comm);
00051   virtual ~model() {}
00052 
00054   virtual void setup() {}
00055 
00057   virtual void add_callback(lbann_callback* cb);
00058 
00060   virtual std::vector<Layer*>& get_layers() = 0;
00061 
00063   virtual DataType get_train_accuracy() const = 0;
00065   virtual DataType get_validate_accuracy() const = 0;
00067   virtual DataType get_test_accuracy() const = 0;
00068 
00070   inline lbann_comm* get_comm() const { return comm; }
00072   inline int64_t get_cur_epoch() const { return m_current_epoch; }
00074   inline int64_t get_cur_step() const { return m_current_step; }
00076   inline execution_mode get_execution_mode() const { return m_execution_mode; }
00077 
00079   virtual void summarize(lbann_summary& summarizer) {}
00080 
00082   bool get_terminate_training() const { return m_terminate_training; }
00084   void set_terminate_training(bool f) { m_terminate_training = f; }
00085     
00086 protected:
00088   execution_mode m_execution_mode;
00090   bool m_terminate_training;
00092   int64_t m_current_epoch;
00094   int64_t m_current_step;
00096   lbann_comm* comm;
00098   std::vector<lbann_callback*> callbacks;
00099 
00100   // Methods for calling every callback at different points.
00101   void setup_callbacks();
00102   void do_train_begin_cbs();
00103   void do_train_end_cbs();
00104   void do_epoch_begin_cbs();
00105   void do_epoch_end_cbs();
00106   void do_batch_begin_cbs();
00107   void do_batch_end_cbs();
00108   void do_test_begin_cbs();
00109   void do_test_end_cbs();
00110   void do_validation_begin_cbs();
00111   void do_validation_end_cbs();
00112   void do_model_forward_prop_begin_cbs();
00113   void do_layer_forward_prop_begin_cbs(Layer* l);
00114   void do_model_forward_prop_end_cbs();
00115   void do_layer_forward_prop_end_cbs(Layer* l);
00116   void do_model_backward_prop_begin_cbs();
00117   void do_layer_backward_prop_begin_cbs(Layer* l);
00118   void do_model_backward_prop_end_cbs();
00119   void do_layer_backward_prop_end_cbs(Layer* l);
00120 };
00121 
00122 }  // namespace lbann
00123 
00124 #endif  // LBANN_MODEL_HPP
